intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day-to-day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real-world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture is available.
Benchmark must run with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
The todo.md entry "Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑v…" should remain open until benchmark run completes and metrics published.
Publish performance baselines in PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling with Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine.
Time Profiler must measure render times <100 ms, Allocations instrument memory profiling <5 MB, Core Animation 60 FPS on device, and tests run on iOS 17 and macOS 14 devices.
Publish performance baselines after manual benchmark testing across multiple platforms (iOS 17..iPadOS 17) once the required hardware is available.

Build time <10s for clean build, binary size <500 KB release; memory footprint <5 MB per screen; 60 FPS on all platforms during interactions; BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes performance tested and baseline documented.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a report after testing on iOS ….. iPad‑?

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Media Assets
functional_units.description: Imports licensed Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H media assets into the system and refreshes regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Runs a lenient‑vs‑strict performance benchmark on macOS with a 1 GiB payload, collects runtime and RSS metrics, and archives results in Documentation/Performance.

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publishes collected performance baseline data for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 into PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling or benchmarking.

functional_units.name: Generate Manual Performance Report
functional_units.description: Documents findings from Xcode Instruments (Time Profiler, Allocations, Core Animation) and other manual profiling tasks into a performance report.

functional_units.name: Compile Cross‑Platform Test Results
functional_units.description: Aggregates results from device and simulator tests across iOS, macOS, and iPadOS, including dark mode, RTL, and locale checks, into a cross‑platform report.

functional_units.name: Finalize Accessibility Sign‑off
functional_units.description: Completes manual accessibility validation (VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, contrast, etc.) and issues final accessibility sign‑off.
